channel.title: NYS:LLY on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:LLY on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: WHO Adds Ozempic and Mounjaro to Its List of Essential Medicines
item.description: The World Health Organization added Novo Nordisk A/S’s Ozempic and Eli Lilly & Co.’s Mounjaro to its list of essential medicines, a step that may expand access to the drugs around the world.

item.title: WHO Adds Ozempic and Mounjaro to Its List of Essential Medicines
item.description: The World Health Organization added Novo Nordisk A/S’s Ozempic and Eli Lilly & Co.’s Mounjaro to its list of essential medicines, a step that may expand access to the drugs around the world.

item.title: Eli Lilly Taps High-Grade Bond Market With Rare 40-Year Paper
item.description: Eli Lilly & Co. is tapping the US investment-grade debt market with a deal that’s expected to include a 40-year bond, a rarity in a world characterized by high borrowing costs.

item.title: Eli Lilly Taps High-Grade Bond Market With Rare 40-Year Paper
item.description: Eli Lilly & Co. is tapping the US investment-grade debt market with a deal that’s expected to include a 40-year bond, a rarity in a world characterized by high borrowing costs.

item.title: Novo Is to Lilly What LVMH Is to Hermes, Fund Manager Reckons
item.description: A widening gulf between the stock performances of Novo Nordisk A/S and its main competitor Eli Lilly & Co has drawn comparison with two of the world’s largest luxury-goods makers.

item.title: Novo Is to Lilly What LVMH Is to Hermes, Fund Manager Reckons
item.description: A widening gulf between the stock performances of Novo Nordisk A/S and its main competitor Eli Lilly & Co has drawn comparison with two of the world’s largest luxury-goods makers.
